1. Charlotte Tilbury – Pillow Talk Lipstick (Pillow Talk Collection)  
2. NARS – Audacious Lipstick  
3. MAC – Love Me Lipstick  
4. Too Faced – Melted Matte Longwear Lipstick  
5. Anastasia Beverly Hills – Liquid Lipstick (Matte & Long-Lasting)  
6. L’Oréal Paris – Colour Riche Intense Volume Matte Lipstick  
7. Revlon – ColorStay Matte Lite Crayon  
8. Maybelline – Super Stay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick

1. Charlotte Tilbury – Pillow Talk Collection (lipsticks within this range are industry gold standard; universally flattering nude‑pinks, high quality formula and shade range).  
2. NARS – Audacious Lipstick (rich pigment, creamy texture, prestige formula performance).  
3. MAC – Love Me Lipstick (innovative argan-oil infused, semi-luminous finish, strong shade range).  
4. Too Faced – Melted Matte Longwear Lipstick (longwear, comfortable matte with good shade variety).  
5. Maybelline – Super Stay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick (exceptional longevity and value, slightly tacky feel).  
6. L’Oréal Paris – Colour Riche Intense Volume Matte (comfortable, plumping matte from the drugstore tier).  
7. Revlon – ColorStay Matte Lite Crayon (lightweight, precise crayon format, solid but less luxe).  
8. Anastasia Beverly Hills – Liquid Lipstick (very longwearing but can be drying and less forgiving than others).
